    threshold analysis | posterior mean estimates

    # get posterior mean estimates
post_means <-
  summary(parkinsons_nma, pars=c("d")) %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  pull("mean")

# print values
post_means

    threshold analysis | design matrix

    threshold | posterior likelihood

    Sigma_d <-
  diag(rep(100^2, length(post_means)))
